about_the_game:
Looking for a way to brag with a new customization item? Then these exclusive lobby avatars are made for you!

With their flashy aura of power, SSGSS Goku and SSGSS Vegeta will make you stand out from the crowd in the Online Lobby!
detailed_description:
Looking for a way to brag with a new customization item? Then these exclusive lobby avatars are made for you!

With their flashy aura of power, SSGSS Goku and SSGSS Vegeta will make you stand out from the crowd in the Online Lobby!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: AMD FX-4350, 4.2 GHz / Intel Core i5-3470, 3.20 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 6870, 1 GB / GeForce GTX 650 Ti, 1 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 1400, 3.2 GHz / Intel Core i7-3770, 3.40 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7870, 2 GB / GeForce GTX 660, 2 GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
